attributes.action: give the local councils support in speeding up the kingskerswell bypass and road to functionally link Newton Abbot / Torbay
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe a more effective link between the A380 to link Torbay with Exeter is in order and needs to be pushed through more quickly to help boost business and commerce in Torbay and the area; and to also reduce traffic queuing at commuting times (thus reducing associated fumes).

I believe, personally, this should have been completed some time ago and is required to create efficient transport links from the M5 to ALL major Devon urban areas.
